main event: On 12 July 1962, a sighting of two unidentified flying objects resembling huge yo-yos of lights was reported in Los Angeles, California.
interesting points: The objects appeared to carry 30-50 passengers, The objects displayed lights flashing in a rotational manner, One object hovered for 20-30 seconds during the sighting, The person reporting was confirmed to be a rational and intelligent observer, Weather conditions were clear with 15 miles visibility during the sighting.
sighted object: two objects resembling huge yo-yos of lights
witness description: Mrs. [redacted], her husband, and her daughter
